name: Silky Sweet Potato Puree
author: USA WEEKEND columnist Pam Anderson
summary: Silky Sweet Potato Puree can be made two days in advance.
ingredients: 3 pounds whole sweet potatoes, pricked with a fork
½ teaspoon salt and freshly ground pepper, to taste
directions: Adjust oven rack to upper-middle position; heat to 425 degrees
Place potatoes on a foil-lined pan; bake 45 to 60 minutes, until tender
Peel when cool enough to handle
Puree with salt and pepper in a food processor
With motor running, gradually add milks through feeder tube, then butter
(Can make up to 2 days ahead; store in an airtight container
